thread.title_full: WATCH: George Lopez Curses Out Woman And Kicks Her Out Of Show! | Qui West | 99.1 KGGI

title: WATCH: George Lopez Curses Out Woman And Kicks Her Out Of Show! | Qui West | 99.1 KGGI
text:
share 
A woman at the George Lopez show wasn't happy with the joke he made about Latino families. She stood up and gave him the finger, that's when George went OFF on her! Qui West began his radio journey in 2006 as an intern in San Francisco where he developed a love for radio. From there, he became a public affairs host and landed a weekend on air spot with KYLD Wild 949. The he hit the majors and worked at Houston's legendary hip hop station KBXX 979 The Box. Qui West hosted the No.1 rated night show in the market for almost 4 years. Most recently, he was home in San Francisco at KRBQ 102. Now he has a new home, right here in the I.E. on 99.1 KGGI. Join him every afternoon from 2-6p and follow him everywhere @QuiWest. Contact
